details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.10 Optional content - Order key
details.description: If an optional content configuration dictionary contains the Order key, the array which is the value of this Order key shall contain references to all OCGs in the conforming file.

rule.description: If an optional content configuration dictionary contains the Order key, the array which is the value of this Order key shall contain references to all OCGs in the conforming file.
